00028 #include <boost/date_time/posix_time/posix_time.hpp>

00031 #include <boost/property_tree/ptree.hpp>

00034 #include "logging.hpp"
00035 #include "network.hpp"
00036 #include "network/broadcaster/directory.hpp"
00037 #include "network/broadcaster/data_connection.hpp"

00039 namespace network {
00040   // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00041   // broadcaster
00042   //  * uses boost::asio
00043   //  * the data is sent to all connected clients
00044   //  * being-alive-ticks are exchanged between server and client
00045   //  * config: 
00046   //   <Data port="xxxx"
00047   //         maxQueueSize_MB="xxxx"
00048   //         maxQueueDelay_Minutes="xxxx"></Data>
00049   namespace broadcaster {
00050   class broadcaster : private boost::noncopyable {
00051   public:
00052     typedef boost::shared_ptr<broadcaster> sptr;
00053 
00054     static sptr make(const boost::property_tree::ptree& config) {
00055       return sptr(new broadcaster(config));
00056     }
00057     virtual ~broadcaster() {}
00058 
00059     // start broadcaster
00060     void start() {
00061       // start listening on data/ctrl sockets
00062       LOG_INFO("broadcaster start");
00063       start_listen();
00064     }
00065   
00066     // stop broadcaster
00067     void stop() {
00068       // announce stop of io_service
00069       LOG_INFO("broadcaster stop");
00070       network::get_io_service().post(strand_.wrap(boost::bind(&broadcaster::do_stop, this)));
00071     }
00072 
00073     typedef data_connection::ptime ptime;
00074     typedef std::string data_type;
00075 
00076     // returns the unique stream number corresponding to id
00077     boost::uint32_t register_stream(std::string path) {
00078       if (path == "") return 0;
00079       const std::pair<boost::uint32_t, bool> r(directory_.insert(path));
00080       // if the directory has changed, broadcast the new directory to all clients
00081       if (r.second)
00082         bc_directory();
00083       return r.first;
00084     }
00085 
00086     void bc_directory() {
00087       const ptime now(boost::posix_time::microsec_clock::universal_time());
00088       bc_data(now, "", directory_.id(), directory_.serialize(now));
00089     }
00090 
00091     typedef boost::shared_ptr<data_type> data_ptr_type;
00092 
00093     // broadcast data
00094     void bc_data(ptime t,
00095                  std::string path,
00096                  data_type id,
00097                  data_type data,
00098                  data_type preamble="") {
00099       // status of broadcaster -> log file
00100       log_status(t);
00101 
00102       // create a shared pointer of the to-be-broadcasted data
00103       data_ptr_type bytes_data(data_ptr_type(new data_type(add_header(t, path, id ,data))));
00104       data_ptr_type bytes_preamble(preamble != ""
00105                                    ? data_ptr_type(new data_type(add_header(t, path, id, preamble)))
00106                                    : data_ptr_type());
00107 
00108       // insert to all data connections, checking if they are still alive
00109       for (std::set<data_connection::sptr>::iterator k(data_connections_.begin());
00110            k!=data_connections_.end(); ) {
00111         if ((*k)->push_back(t, path, bytes_data, bytes_preamble))
00112           ++k;
00113         else
00114           data_connections_.erase(k++);
00115       }
00116     }
00117 
00118     boost::asio::strand& get_strand() { return strand_; }
00119 
00120   protected:
00121     data_type add_header(ptime t,
00122                          std::string path,
00123                          data_type id,
00124                          data_type data) {
00125       const protocol::header h(id, t, register_stream(path), data.size());
00126 #if 1
00127       data_type bytes(sizeof(protocol::header)+data.size(), 0);
00128       std::copy(h.begin(),    h.end(),    bytes.begin());
00129       std::copy(data.begin(), data.end(), bytes.begin()+sizeof(protocol::header));
00130 #else
00131       data_type bytes;
00132       std::copy(h.begin(),    h.end(),    std::back_inserter(bytes));
00133       std::copy(data.begin(), data.end(), std::back_inserter(bytes));
00134 #endif
00135       return bytes;
00136     }
00137   private:
00138     broadcaster(const boost::property_tree::ptree& config)
00139       : strand_(network::get_io_service())
00140       , max_queue_total_size_(1024*1024*config.get<size_t>("Data.<xmlattr>.maxQueueSize_MB"))
00141       , max_queue_delay_(boost::posix_time::minutes(config.get<size_t>("Data.<xmlattr>.maxQueueDelay_Minutes")))
00142       , last_log_status_time_(boost::posix_time::microsec_clock::universal_time())
00143     {
00144       using namespace boost::asio::ip;
00145       acceptor_map_["Data"] = acceptor_ptr
00146         (new tcp::acceptor(network::get_io_service(),
00147                            tcp::endpoint(tcp::v4(), config.get<size_t>("Data.<xmlattr>.port"))));
00148     }
00149 
00150     typedef data_connection::time_duration time_duration;
00151     typedef boost::shared_ptr<boost::asio::ip::tcp::socket> tcp_socket_ptr;
00152     typedef std::set<data_connection::sptr> data_connections;
00153     typedef boost::shared_ptr<boost::asio::ip::tcp::acceptor> acceptor_ptr;
00154     typedef std::map<std::string, acceptor_ptr> acceptor_map;
00155 
00156     void start_listen() {
00157       BOOST_FOREACH(const acceptor_map::value_type& a, acceptor_map_) {
00158         // setup acceptor
00159         a.second->set_option(boost::asio::socket_base::reuse_address(true));
00160 
00161         // start listening
00162         a.second->listen();      
00163 
00164         // asynchronously accept data connections
00165         async_accept(a);
00166       }
00167     }
00168 
00169     void async_accept(const acceptor_map::value_type& a) {
00170       tcp_socket_ptr new_socket(new boost::asio::ip::tcp::socket(network::get_io_service()));
00171       a.second->async_accept(*new_socket,
00172                              strand_.wrap(boost::bind(&broadcaster::handle_accept, this,
00173                                                       boost::asio::placeholders::error,
00174                                                       new_socket, a)));
00175     }
00176 
00177     void handle_accept(const boost::system::error_code& ec,
00178                        tcp_socket_ptr socket,
00179                        const acceptor_map::value_type& a) {
00180       LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("servce::handle_accept type='%s' error_code='%s'") % a.first % ec));
00181       if (!ec) {
00182         if (a.first == "Data") {
00183           boost::system::error_code ec_ignore;
00184           LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("remote endpoint='%s'") % socket->remote_endpoint(ec_ignore)));
00185 
00186           // make new data connection and insert into the set of open connections
00187           data_connections_.insert(data_connection::make(network::get_io_service(), strand_, socket,
00188                                                          directory_, max_queue_total_size_, max_queue_delay_));
00189 
00190           // asynchronously accept next data connection
00191           async_accept(a);
00192 
00193         } else {
00194           LOG_ERROR(str(boost::format("unknown type='%s'") % a.first));
00195         }
00196       } else {
00197         LOG_ERROR(str(boost::format("handle_accept type='%s' ec='%s'") % a.first % ec));
00198       }
00199     }
00200 
00201     void log_status(ptime t) const {
00202       if (t-last_log_status_time_ > boost::posix_time::seconds(1)) {
00203         LOG_STATUS_T(t, str(boost::format("#connections=%3d") % data_connections_.size()));
00204         BOOST_FOREACH(const data_connections::value_type& dc, data_connections_) {
00205           boost::system::error_code ecl_ignore, ecr_ignore;
00206           LOG_STATUS_T(t, str(boost::format("  %s - %s : delay[ms] = %.2f (%s)")
00207                               % dc->local_endpoint(ecl_ignore) 
00208                               % dc->remote_endpoint(ecr_ignore) 
00209                               % dc->max_delay_msec()
00210                               % dc->stream_name()));
00211           dc->reset_max_delay();
00212         }
00213         last_log_status_time_= t;
00214       }
00215     }
00216 
00217     void do_stop() {
00218       data_connections_.clear();
00219     }
00220 
00221     boost::asio::strand     strand_;               // asio strand
00222     acceptor_map            acceptor_map_;         // map of acceptors
00223     const size_t            max_queue_total_size_; // queue total size of data connections
00224     const time_duration     max_queue_delay_;      // queue maximum delay of data connections
00225     directory               directory_;            // directory of available data streams
00226     data_connections        data_connections_;     // set of data connections
00227     mutable ptime           last_log_status_time_; // 
00228   } ;
00229 
00230 } // namespace broadcaster
00231 } // namespace network
00232 #endif // _BROADCASTER_HPP_cm111219_
